Summary: I saw a bright yellow light above the woods that dropped straight down.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just layed down and I looked up out the window. I saw a bright glowing yellow light (almost neon) above the woods in the distance. Then all of a sudden it dropped straight down. I could faintly hear this whir sound when it dropped. I wasn't able to see it anymore. I have no idea what it could have been.
